actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States giving to Congress the power to make or alter regulations relating to the times, places, and manner of appointing electors to choose the President.

summary.text: Provides that the times, places, and manner of appointing electors to choose the President shall be prescribed in each State by the legislature thereof, but the Congress may at any time by law make or alter such regulations.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States giving to Congress the power to make or alter regulations relating to the times, places, and manner of appointing electors to choose the President.
